description:
'''Anabela Braz Pires''' (born 22 September 1976 in Almada) is a [[Portuguese people|Portuguese]] singer and musical theatre actress, best known in Portugal [[mononym]]ously by her first name, '''Anabela'''.

Her career in music has spanned over decades, and she is well known for representing [[Portugal in the Eurovision Song Contest|Portugal]] at the [[Eurovision Song Contest]], her work as a solo recording artist, and her work in musical theatre collaborating with producer [[Filipe La Féria]]. In a 2006 interview with ''Selecções do [[Reader's Digest]]'', she joked that in the national consciousness, she went from being known as "the Eurovision girl" to "the La Féria girl."
